title: Gloomhaven Campaign
description: Information about a campaign for the boardgame Gloomhaven

prosperity.title: Prosperity
prosperity.description: The number of checked boxes on the prosperity track

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: The list of earned global achievements.

count.title: Count
count.description: The number of times the achievement was obtained.

state.title: State
state.description: Open means, the sticker is on the map. Done marks the sticker as checked and Locked marks the sticker with a red cross meaning the scenario cant be started anymore.

classes.title: Character classes
classes.description: The list of unlocked character classes. If a member of the party uses an unlockable class it MUST also be provided here.

items.title: Reward items
items.description: The names of reward items unlocked. Those will be added to the store. The item can come from the rewards deck or the item design deck.

anyOf.title: Spoiler free, change to see content
Sanctuary Level
anyOf.description: The number of checked boxes on the sanctuary track. If not included the sanctuary will not be loaded.

specialConditions.title: Special opening conditions
specialConditions.description: Conditions that must be met to unlock certain game components.

donations.title: Sanctuary Donations
donations.description: Number of donations to the Sanctuary.

drakeAided.title: Drake Aided
drakeAided.description: Gained "The Drake's Command" and "The Drake's Treasure" achievement.

lowReputation.title: Low Reputation
lowReputation.description: Had a reputation of -10 or lower.

highReputation.title: Hight Reputation
highReputation.description: Had a reputation of 10 or higher.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any notes that should be added to the Party Sheet. Each note will be written on a new line.

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: The list of active party members

checkmarks.title: Checkmarks
checkmarks.description: The number of checkmarks earned for completing battle goals.

perks.title: Unlocked Perks
perks.description: The unlocked perks. Count the checkboxes from top-left to bottom-right to find the correct number to input here. Use CTRL to select multiple entries.

quest.title: Personal Quest
quest.description: The personal quest card this character has.

abilities.title: Unlocked Abilities
abilities.description: The abilities the were gained through level up.

anyOf.title: Enter freely (Spoiler free), change to select class

items.title: Items
items.description: All items the character has, whether they are currently equipped or not. The position determines where the item will be placed. If "Unequipped" the item will be placed below the character sheet. The positions "Active1" to "Active4" are the slots for active ability cards.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes that should be added to the front of the character sheet. Every note will be written on a new line.

hiddenNotes.title: Hidden Notes
hiddenNotes.description: Notes that should be added to the back of the character sheet. These notes are only visible to the player owning the character. Every note will be written on a new line.

anyOf.title: Enter freely (Spoiler free), change to select class

quest.title: Personal Quest
quest.description: The quest that was completed for retirement.

events.title: Event decks
events.description: Changes to the event decks. Lists the events that should be added and removed from an event deck. The list "Bottom Events" also defines the events that should be places at the bottom of the deck. The first entry in the list will be so bottom card, followed by the next entry and so on. All cards not included in this list will be shuffled and put on top of them. The events 1-30 don't have to be included in the "Added Events" list, as they are included by default.
